author: djencks
msg: Use TransactionContextManager rather than TransactionContext static methods.  Mostly fix GERONIMO-355. Progress on GERONIMO-347. This demonstrates the problems in GERONIMO-359 and GERONIMO-360 (there are now itest failures)

author: dain
msg: Rewrote deployment to build output into a temp directory instead of into a packed jar file
This will make adding support for manifest classpath entries trivial
Changed entire system to meticulously track temp files and delete them asap
